  • Constructor Details

    • Time

      public Time() throws java.lang.Exception
      This no argument constructor sets each instance variable to zero. This ensures that all time objects start at a constant state.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • Time

      public Time​(int hour, int minute, int second) throws java.lang.Exception
      * Time constructor - argument based.
      Parameters:
      hour - - the hour {@value=#MAX_HOUR}
      minute - - the minute MIN_HOUR
      second - - the second
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - - in the case of a non valid value
